body_html:
How about this?

change input/output node names and then your server dynamically sends those values as well as some other parameters for initializing when the app executed? don't store those values in the app.

One issue left though, people can still extract those data from the graph file when loaded directly from desktop except the graph file is memory mapped graph, and android can't load memory mapped file (maybe?)

body:
How about this?

change input/output node names and then your server dynamically sends those values as well as some other parameters for initializing when the app executed?  don't store those values in the app.

One issue left though, people can still extract those data from the graph file when loaded directly from desktop except the graph file is memory mapped graph, and android can't load memory mapped file (maybe?)
